element.name: Pridestalker
element.source: Axel's Homebrew Collected from Many Places

description.p: Pridestalker Tabaxi are more ambush oriented and feral than the ordinary Tabaxi, and therefore more adept at hunting, whether it be beasts, monsters or people. There are as many different Pridestalkers as ways to hunt prey. These Tabaxi are prideful, collect trophies made from their preys' remnants, and wouldn't give up a chance to go hunting.
Ability Score Increase. Your Dexterity score increases by 2, and one Ability Score of your choice increases by 1.
Speed. Your base walking speed is 40 feet.

Darkvision. You have a cat's keen senses, especially in the dark. You can see in dim light within 60 feet of you as if it were bright light, and in darkness as if it were dim light. You can't discern color in darkness, only shades of red.

Pridestalker Agility. Your strength and agility allow you to consequently leap at your targets. On your turn, you can perform a running long jump immidiately after moving 5 feet, instead of 10, at an increased length. Your jumps are 5 feet longer and higher. You can use your Dexterity instead of Strength to determine your jump length or height. You also gain climbing speed equal to half your walking speed.

Feline Ambusher. You have advantage on Dexterity (Stealth) checks when in environments similar to tall grass, dense bushes or tree foliage, these environments don't have to be naturally occurring. Whenever you are unseen, you can perform a running long jump towards a creature in range and immidiately attack it with a melee weapon, you don't have to move before the jump. Successful attacks made using this trait are critical hits.
Knack for Hunting. You have proficiency in the Stealth and your choice of Perception or Survival skills.
